scripts.daily-news: claude -p "Search for today's news and update daily_briefing.md with: 10 top geopolitical stories and 10 top financial stories. Format: H3 headline with date AND time in italics (e.g. 'Feb 3, 2:30 PM' - when the first article was published, NEVER use future dates, only today or earlier), then a blockquote (>) with a 1-2 sentence summary, then 3 detailed paragraphs per story. List 10 sources at the end of each section."
